question.title: CXF Custom Class name
question.body:
I need to migrate from Axis2 to CXF and I need some classes to have custom names. They are defined as elements in their xsd with underscores, think my_Enum_Name. CXF makes MYENUMNAME out of those and I need it to be MY_ENUM_NAME. I tried this in the bindings file:

<jxb:bindings node="xs:simpleType[@name='my_Enum_Name']">
      <jxb:typesafeEnumClass name="MY_ENUM_NAME">
        <jxb:typesafeEnumMember name="EMPTY" value=""/>
      </jxb:typesafeEnumClass>
    </jxb:bindings>

But the generated file still has the name MYENUMNAME. Any ideas?
